website_summaries.verdict: This large, green cutting board has soft grip handles and rubber feet on both side ends that help it to hold firmly in place when chopping food.
pros: Deep juice grooves to prevent spillage of liquids
Doesn't stain much or slide when cutting
And washing the board is very simple
cons: Rubber has been reported to not be as effective as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Bent and warped immediately
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend. The hard plastic bent and warped right away. Knives now slide off it. After only a few uses, I am replacing this with a better quality cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I needed a board that would lay across one side of my double sinks and still rest on the middle divider and also overlap one side with enough board remaining to hold the board steady. This works perfectly. No more sliding off and dumping a roast or chicken into the sing while I am readying it for the stove. Thanks RAJ. I am happy with this board and I recommend it. ** One caution: Surface is extremely slick and many foods, raw meat in particular, will slide right off of the board if you are not careful.
customer_reviews.author: hombre243Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly, non slip.
customer_reviews.text: I like this cutting board. It’s very sturdy and doesn’t slip on the counter when using it. Plus, I love the green color I chose. Lemons and celery slice perfectly on this cutting board because of this sturdiness, which are the two things I’ve used this far since it’s new. Happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pool party girl

customer_reviews.title: Groove very shallow/board warped
customer_reviews.text: Groove is very shallow, does not direct fluid along groove but rather it wells up and spills over the side of the cutting board. Useless for tomatoes or other high-moisture vegetables, which is what I bought it for. Don't waste your money. UPDATE: It warped the first time I washed it in hot water.
customer_reviews.author: Sagwagon Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cutting board
customer_reviews.text: We needed one more cutting board for our kitchen, & found this one - love the green color; received promptly from Amazon, it is a very sturdy nice cutting board that has nice sides for help to stick to the counter, a nice groove for juices & so forth. Ours lays flat, washed perfectly in the dishwasher, so I do recommend as I have no warping in ours as others have found.
customer_reviews.author: catgirl74

customer_reviews.title: The boards don't move while you cut!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these cutting boards have grooves on all three sizes. My only previously grooved cutting board was a very large one. So these give me more options with smaller things like tomatoes, strawberries, etc. without having to pull out a huge grooved board. I've also noticed that it doesn't take on the color of certain vegetables like my older ones did. So when I cut spinach or beets, the color doesn't get into the board at all. It washes right off. The rubber edging does keep it in place while cutting. I'm happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecka N

customer_reviews.title: Great quality chopping boards!!!
customer_reviews.text: The chopping boards are very good quality!!I really enjoyed using them. I will totally recommend these. It is very sturdy the little feat on the board helps it to stay sturdy and not move when you are chopping. The best part the washing was a breeze it did not leave a stain which is very important for me.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T.

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use and Clean
customer_reviews.text: I like these cutting boards very much - I bought two. They are the exact size I wanted, the color goes well in my kitchen, they are stable when cutting, they are easy to rinse or wash in the dishwasher. and they seem very durable. I use them for food preparation, anywhere from soft grapes to hard rutabaga and butternut squash I would refer them to anyone without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Slides around on counter.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the cutting board, but it slides around on the countertop. This is despite the description of "Non-Slip".
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Will not slide on your counter
customer_reviews.text: Good Product, will not slide on your counter while you're cutting because of the nonslip border on one of the sides. Also, there is a small dip around the cutting board surface, so all liquids that come from meats, veggies, or fruits that I'm cutting doesn't spill everywhere, love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jwen_rtk

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I use my cutting boards quite a lot so I appreciate that these are sturdy yet low-profile and light weight. They're easy to store in a kitchen drawer because they're not overly bulky like my older cutting boards which I found to be unnecessarily thick and heavy. Easy to use, clean and store, and the handles are non slip and come in cute colors. I ordered the yellow/orange/green set and I absolutely love the look and feel of these boards. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Large Cutting Boards
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for cutting boards this size. I bought a couple at BBB - paid 3 times what I did for these. They were white with a colored trim. I couldn't find those online so I bought these: Same design/just in colors. Not a big deal. I will order the green one later this week because they are what I want. The only drawback is that the cutting surface is kinda slick, but I anticipate that will remedy itself. All in all, I consider it a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Timewaster

customer_reviews.title: My new favorites
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are great! I washed them in the dishwasher....the sizes are very convenient. I really like the trough to catch juices. And the rubbery edges keep the boards in place while I’m cutting. My knives won’t dull on these, like the glass boards. These are my new favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Kim McM

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product only a couple weeks, but so far, so good...I love the cutting boards. They are easy to clean, are safe in the dishwasher and my knife doesn't cut into the board to leave tiny pieces of plastic. The hard surface is great! I bought a second set.
customer_reviews.author: laguna

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and built to specs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to go inside of my sink in a 2020 jayco travel trailer. I used it nearly everyday for additional countertop space and food prep when needed. The board does seem to have good heat resistance and rigidity. I strongly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are awesome. The look great in my kitchen, the white with red borders accents the kitchen nicely. I use them daily and they don't slip and clean up very nicely. The 3 different sizes are nice depending on what I am cutting up. Definitely a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose
customer_reviews.text: We are using this cutting board as a sensory board for our daughter but we are going to buy more to replace our current cutting boards. The size is great and it’s not super heavy. The rubber edges are awesome at keeping it from sliding around. The handle is great for moving it around. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fewell

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cutting Board
customer_reviews.text: These are a great size for cutting smaller amounts of veggies. I really like the enclosed handle & the fact that they are dishwasher safe. Also, they seem to be made well. Would highly recommend these cutting boards.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn S

customer_reviews.title: Love this cutting board
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I buy. Why? Because the first one proved to be outstanding and this is for our second home. I love how light it is, how easy to clean and it just feels sturdy and nice. Not to mention - someone had the courage to make it in a fun color! Thank you~
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Fairchild

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I own this board for about a year now, using it about once a week. It's still going strong--like new. It doesn't slip and has a boarder around the edges to help catch juices. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small size cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be our sweet board for cutting fruits (no onion or garlic chopping allowed). The size is small and handy for small fruits.
customer_reviews.author: indigo glow

customer_reviews.title: Shallow grooves almost pointless.
customer_reviews.text: Cooked an average-sized tri-tip medium rare and when I cut it the grooves didn't keep any of the juices on the board there's really no reason for them to have grooves this low. Otherwise, I guess the boards are a lot smaller than they looked online, the tri-tip I had barely fit on the largest one so I imagine cutting a full chicken on this wouldn't be possible without a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Discover

customer_reviews.title: Durable and beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: Really great cutting board. Durable. Easy to clean. Ridge on sides helps keep liquids on board. Smooth surface, color makes easily identifiable so that I know this is one for meats vs the one I have for veggies.
customer_reviews.author: bookreader

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive
customer_reviews.text: A gift. Main complaint, doesn't fit into dishwasher. Will have to be washed by hand. Otherwise, a terrific cutting board. She really did like the size for usefulness. I guess maybe 1 1/2 inches less wide and it'd have fit perfectly into her didhwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Broderson

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board isn’t flat
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cutting board made of plastic that will not slip around on the countertop while cutting. This one is thick and has a small trough around the edge of one side and the other side is flat. The trough side is bowed up in the middle, so it spins like a top with that side up. However when you flip it over the four corners connect to the counter top securely and keep it steady so you can cut without any sliding. It’s a good size for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Malarkey

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service~
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cutting board with a groove to catch the juice from the meat. I accidentally ordered a small size board. When I called the manufacturer they were VERY helpful to assist me in obtaining the correct size and extending a discount to me. They were easy to work with and the cutting board will work well. This vendor has other items in which I have an interest and I will order from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Bubamara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before ordering these cutting boards and couldnt be more pleased - perfect sizes - very durable and there is no staining and it stays in place ..I am happy I made this choice
customer_reviews.author: Denise Greb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, Compact
customer_reviews.text: Compact cutting board I was looking for. Fits well in my small kitchen and size is ideal for cooking for 1-2 people! Had it for about a week now and no noticeable scratches/discoloration.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: doesn't lay flat, slides around
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't lay flat, the middle part of the board is either sunken or raised. Which means if you lay the board on one side the rubber feet work. But if you flip the board around to use the other side, the rubber feet don't contact and it just slides around. Tried gently bending the board back into shape but no luck, it stays bent.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lien

customer_reviews.title: Great smallish cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I got one in the yellow/orange color combo that kind of matches our kitchen. Seems resistant (not impervious) to scratches from knives, and cleans beautifully! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Peg C.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, easy cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Love the bright color and great size for my RV with its small kitchen. I have had this type of board before and they last a very long time and are so easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: D. Faunce

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite cutting boards!
customer_reviews.text: Possibly my new favorite cutting boards ever and made in USA!!!! Sturdy feet, 2 sides to use, and one grooved side for juices... they have everything! Highly recommend! I want more RAJ products!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Harris

customer_reviews.title: Durable product
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting board. Extremely to easy to clean. Thin and slim fits into any space on my counter. Very durable. Bright vibrant colors adds a flare to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Sam P

customer_reviews.title: Gotta buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Great board. I already had a plastic one I purchased years ago and haven’t been able to replace the one I had. Now I can! There are notes on the wrapping that come with it, that list full details (cleaning care etc) amongst other things.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great size for two.
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for a large steak or two chicken breasts and they easily fit in the dishwasher. Also the non slip ends are terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Urchins

customer_reviews.title: ureally useful
customer_reviews.text: handy to have different sizes, and be able to use both sides of each. Cheerful colored edges. Hold to counter well. dishwasher safe. we use 'em a lot.
customer_reviews.author: asym44

customer_reviews.title: Better than my new expensive OXO cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color options allows me to designate which foods to cut on them. I got the pink as well Also love the convenient handle for hanging up to dry. Make more colors/designs please.
customer_reviews.author: ginger

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: I like the size variety, they are attractive and somewhat stop leaking juices however the top scratches easily and the scratches stain over time
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Good looking!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cutting board! I purchased the green, orange and yellow and the colors make me so happy! Very sturdy and they are non-skid on the counter top!
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Valley

customer_reviews.title: Warped
customer_reviews.text: Well, this board arrived already warped. I bought it because I love the color! And the color is just as nice as in the photo. It seems well made/sturdy. I’m not going to return it. I figure, for the price, it’s still usable and I don’t want the headache of returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutting board
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice weight and I love the no-slip edge. I do choose it over my old cutting board. I don't have a dishwasher, but it cleans like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mario

customer_reviews.title: Good board
customer_reviews.text: This is my first color cutting board, I love it! I got the green and red strawberries look more appealing on this board! It’s a good quality board, love the juice catch insert
customer_reviews.author: Mommytd

customer_reviews.title: One for veggies and fruits- other for meats
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I bought two of them. I Bought them for my motorhome—I was tired of moving my big wooden cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Nanyer

customer_reviews.title: Colorful
customer_reviews.text: Great for everything easy to clean and glad I got this tired of not having a cutting board and it’s so colorful which is a plus
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Chuckluck

customer_reviews.title: Great cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I bought the larger size board to fit across my sink. Works perfectly! Easy to clean and has a convenient handle.
customer_reviews.author: M. Crane

customer_reviews.title: Boards are not flat so only one side does not slip
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and received 2 of these boards. I like the size, shape, and the fact I can put them in the dishwasher. My only problem is that both boards are slightly warped, so that they do not lie flat. That means that I cannot use one side because the board slides around.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and size
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t scratch easily when you cut on it. The no-slip grippers on edges work well. Also the medium is a nice size. Easy to use and store.
customer_reviews.author: smartin

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Cutting Boards
customer_reviews.text: Am very pleased with this product. I was concerned that chopping might leave knife marks, but so far none at all! Also, the three sizes are very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Kate M.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you need!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! I needed an XL cutting board to use for making pastries. It’s very easy to clean and store. It was as described and I would reorder from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen E. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This size board stores easily my cabinets so I don’t have to clutter the countertops. It is light weight and easy to clean. I’m pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: UpNorth Smile

customer_reviews.title: Perfect board!
customer_reviews.text: This board is just the right size. I can cut anything on it, pop it in the dishwasher, and it's beautiful and ready to use again. So happy I got this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: Love these cutting boards. The three sizes are useful. The rubber feet keep the boards from sliding. I like that they have one side with a groove to catch liquids.
customer_reviews.author: Malory

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than expected, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace smaller old plastic cutting board - I love the orange color and the groove to keep liquids from running onto the counter top.
customer_reviews.author: Bayleaf

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have paid better attention to the size of these cutting boards! If you have a small galley kitchen and you don’t cook a lot, these would be perfect. I cook a lot and large quantities, I ended up buying a different set, and I use these in my craft room.
customer_reviews.author: L. Leon

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have only used the small one and once but they are just what I ordered and seem perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large cutting board. Although the color is very nice, two tones of orange, the quality is not worth the price. The board arrived warped. I am returning it for full refund because I don't trust a replacement would be of any better quality.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board stay put
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are excellent they stay put on the counter. I really like them
customer_reviews.author: Janice H

customer_reviews.title: Cutting board came bent
customer_reviews.text: Unable to keep board from moving around when cutting. Does not stay put because it is bent and rubberized ends don't touch the surface so it is not flat and moves around.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I love the color
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, great price, I love color for my cooking. It makes me happy and grips very well to the counters so it's wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: I love my new cutting board 😍❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect I love this cutting board, easy to clean! Attractive in appearance. The best I've bought in years.
customer_reviews.author: Anne of East Texas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly into our dishwasher and has ample amount of cutting board space. Absolutely love. I have 2 but really will probably buy a few more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Erica M G

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the non-slip feature of this cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I've used this cutting board for a couple of weeks now, and I've been very pleased. My favorite thing about the cutting board is it doesn't slip. It makes using it a lot safer than previous plastic cutting boards I've bought. I also like that you can put this in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Raleigh Gould

customer_reviews.title: durable and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I used it the first night! nice size and easy clean up
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: A very good inexpensive cutting board
customer_reviews.text: The only reason that I downgraded this to 4 stars is that the first board I received was warped. I Emailed RAJ, the distributor and I had a new board within a week despite 2 days of interrupted mail service. The board is the perfect size for my small counter top. It stays put on either side, resists cuts from and doesn't dull very sharp knives, is light weight, easy to store and easy to lift and maneuver in the sink. From a practical standpoint. If there are better boards available I can't imagine how they are better. The price is also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Richard McDonough

customer_reviews.title: Non slip
customer_reviews.text: Love this cutting board! Doesn't slip on the granite countertops. Will be ordering another.
customer_reviews.author: jan c

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, sturdy, perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: good looking and stays in place when in use. recess around perimeter collects and hold juices so no slop.
customer_reviews.author: diana foltz

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great package of cutting boards. Nice to have various sizes, small ones is great for slicing fruit for smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great cutting board, I love the color, exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Y. Berry

customer_reviews.title: I like this!
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it looks, it stays in place on the counter, easy to wipe off.
customer_reviews.author: Annalie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for individuals with limited storage space, works great, and love the non skid.
customer_reviews.author: PINK09

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for cutting vegetables and it has a nonslip grip. The handle is nice and green color makes it attractive. Dishwasher safe for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice size
customer_reviews.text: The side with the groove around the edge lays flat and won't move on the table, however when turning it over it moves on the table. Wish you would make even a larger size. Pretty good product.
customer_reviews.author: Marion S.

customer_reviews.title: not good product
customer_reviews.text: "DISHWASHER SAFE" first time at my Siemens washer the board become like a banana..... not to used in dishwasher!
customer_reviews.author: Hershumiqwa

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cutting board..it doesn't slip on my counter, it is very easy to clean, and is anti-bacterial. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: Love these boards. Not only are they really useful, they are very colorful. The handle makes it so easy to remove from cabinet. Dogs also like them because they often get vegetables while we use the board.
customer_reviews.author: Bettay K.

customer_reviews.title: It slips sometimes
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board looks nice and cleans super easy. I use it on my granite counter and for the most part it doesn’t slip when using. But when it does slip, I put a wet paper towel underneath for the fix. I still would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good Gripping .
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed! Does not slide around... Perfect for using in our 5th wheel RV
customer_reviews.author: MidCenturyMama

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with your product. It is perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: B. Odea

customer_reviews.title: Warped
customer_reviews.text: First board was warped, replacement board was warped; returned both.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Goodell

customer_reviews.title: good cutting board
customer_reviews.text: Really need to scrub off carrots, red peppers and other vegetables with dark juice but still a great cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: BRYAN A

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it's a good and fair price and it's a great cutting board for the price
customer_reviews.author: Terry R.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got this cutting board. I prefer the plastic ones as they are better to clean. Now, to just not melt it onto my stove top like the last one...
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Noseda

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are very well built, don't slip on my counter top and look very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Richard H.

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: While putting these in the dishwasher won't necessarily ruin them, ours did warp within the first 4 or 5 times it went through. We bought 2 of them. 1 only has minor warping (maybe an eighth of an inch between center and ends), but the other one is more severe (closer to a quarter of an inch). Not sure it is even possible to guarantee no warping, but they shouldn't say dishwasher safe because it does impact the usability of the product.
customer_reviews.author: JRP

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the collection.  good size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Perfect size for chopping small vegs, cheeses, slicing sandwiches, mincing herbs.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hill

customer_reviews.title: Warped after one wash
customer_reviews.text: I washed this one time in the dishwasher and it is visibly warped. You can't cut evenly or efficiently on a warped cutting board. I am a professional executive chef, and purchased this for home use. I wouldn't even recommend this for a beginner cook.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Emerson

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Non skid is wonderful. Also appreciate dishwasher safe. The size is perfect for everyday meals. I really like the quality. It is well worth the price and I plan to buy another one. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: ALN

customer_reviews.title: Great board.
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board does what I want a cutting board to do. It is good and does not dull my knives. Perfect for my small apartment
customer_reviews.author: Corbin Dallas

customer_reviews.title: good quality , brightens up my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and was pleased with the good ratings . I would recommend this cutting , it is the best I've had in a very long time .
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Duffy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SIZE
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our RV not too big or too small. Like the handle cut out also
customer_reviews.author: JANET COLLIER

customer_reviews.title: Great Board
customer_reviews.text: Nice ,sturdy cutting board. Weighted enough to not slide around on the counter. Good cutting surface.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good cutting board
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the longevity of this cutting board yet, but I'm pleased with its performance so far. Nice feel, and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hofelich

customer_reviews.title: stains too easily
customer_reviews.text: from the very first use, it stained from very ordinary veggies like carrots and celery. Stains don't come out. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RCA

customer_reviews.title: Dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.text: Dishwasher safe, which is important to me because if I’m cutting chicken, I want to run these boards on a sanitize cycle without them getting warped. I also like the channel around the border which keeps fluids from running onto the counter. Sturdy and tough. Great cutting board!
customer_reviews.author: BD

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: Liked the three sizes. The large size however does not fit in my dishwasher. I love the rubber around the edges that grips to my counter when in use.
customer_reviews.author: Jean D

customer_reviews.title: Looks and functions good
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. The green color looks great in the kitchen, and the little feet keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are antibacterial and they are the perfect sizes! They also feel durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeep Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s lightweight, and we don’t have to use a heavy cutting board which is hard to carry or wash. This one is the perfect size, fits in the dishwasher, and since it comes in colors, I could choose the red to match other decor. Fast shipping! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly as described. The rubber sides help it grip the countertop so it doesn't slip around while cutting.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Z

customer_reviews.title: They're good cutting boards but the rubber doesn't help much
customer_reviews.text: They're good cutting boards but the rubber doesn't help much. I have found it works when I turn it over, but to use the side with the juice well (which is the point) is futile without putting a rubber trivet underneath.
customer_reviews.author: molly c

product_meta.title: Raj Plastic Cutting Board Reversible Cutting board, Dishwasher Safe, Chopping Boards, Juice Groove, Large Handle, Non-Slip, BPA Free (Extra Large (17.4" x 11.81"), Lime Green)
feature_bullets: ✅ LARGE GRIP GREEN CUTTING BOARDS - Raj Antibacterial, BPA-free, polypropylene board come in a convenient size 17.4 x 11.81 inch and 0.38 inches thick. They have large soft grip handles and are Lime Green colored board with Green boarders.
✅ NON-SLIP EDGES - Cutting boards have non- slip rubber on both side ends which make them convenient and safe to handle and keeps board firmly in place.
✅ DISHWASHER SAFE - Those Polypropylene dishwasher safe boards will not degrade or warp in the dishwasher and are stain resistant.
✅ DISHWASHER SAFE - Those Polypropylene dishwasher safe boards will not degrade or warp in the dishwasher and are stain resistant.
